channel.title: Miniconda on Jürgen Gmach
channel.description: Recent content in Miniconda on Jürgen Gmach

item.title: Conda, Miniconda and 2x Anaconda
item.description: While I certainly heard of Conda, Miniconda, and Anaconda before, I only had a vague idea of these terms and what is behind them. So, let’s get the terminology straight. Conda… what? Conda Conda is a CLI application which does package, dependency and environment management, not only for Python, but also for other languages. Anaconda Anaconda is an open-source Python distribution platform. This is the all-in-one package, containing not only the Conda application, but already many packages which you usually need for a data science project.
